reviewsJson.markdown:
Setup: SXK Hadaly clone, 22ga ss316l 10-wrap, Cellucotton wicking

Testing: Inawera 555 Gold

Flavor Description: Sweet and spicy light pipe tobacco. IMO this is more like smoking a virginia/burley mix than most virginia and burley flavorings offer. 

Off-flavors: none

throat hit: none

uses and pairings: Other pipe tobaccos. You could probably pull a cigarette out with this one if you put in some ash notes and some more astringent tobaccos, but this is a pipe tobacco imo. 

second opinions: none i could find on here.
reviewsJson.author: [deleted]
reviewsJson.title: 555 Gold
